website_summaries.verdict: A good premium option for a top-loading water cooler that comes with hot and cold spouts.
pros: Separate hot and cold spouts make the water cooler ideal for drinking and meals
The smaller body is just the right size to fit on a counter top near waist height
cons: The cooling properties of the water cooler are lackluster, producing temperatures just below room temp

customer_reviews.title: Amazing product, slightly confusing indicator lights
customer_reviews.text: Great product. Hot water is steaming hot, cold water is nice and chilly. Be advised, the hot and cold lights on the front turn on and off by themselves, depending on whether the heating or cooling units are actively heating or cooling or not because the water is already at the desired temperature. UPDATE: You wouldn't think it, but having hot water on hand at all times has dramatically decreased my coffee consumption in favor of drinking more tea. So, added benefit.
customer_reviews.author: andy

customer_reviews.title: I'm pleased with my purchase.
customer_reviews.text: This was perfect for my office. I placed a mat under it because reviews for countertop water dispensers always mentioned leaks. I have not experienced that with this. I researched for a week and this was the overall best in this price range. The cold water is very cold and the hot water is "tea ready" hot. So far so good.
customer_reviews.author: Erica

customer_reviews.title: After two years, we love it!
customer_reviews.text: We bought this cooler to replace a GE countertop that died. The cooler sits on top of our wine cooler, so we save floor space but selection was limited since most are floor models. After two years, we are very pleased. Cold water is cold, and my wife loves the hot water to make tea and hot chocolate. The black unit is truly elegant looking. Buy it, you won't be disappointed.
customer_reviews.author: RLT

customer_reviews.title: But what I don't like about it is the seemingly very small reservoir of ...
customer_reviews.text: very convenient, to place this in the alcove of our kitchen. When there are lots of people over it is handy and the grandkids can't tip it over, and its harder for THEM to reach it... even though they can. But what I don't like about it is the seemingly very small reservoir of COLD WATER because when we have guests, and I go to fill up my cup, I drink and the water is only ROOM TEMP and that's disappointing! I want COLD WATER and I don't recall our bigger coolers ever running in to this problem. The reservoir tanks are not able to keep it cold with heavy use.
customer_reviews.author: Grant

customer_reviews.title: We love this one so much we bought to one for the office and one for the home.
customer_reviews.text: I didn’t know I could drink so much water. The fact that they just water is chilled is awesome. It keep the water cold and chills it back up very quickly. I love the fact that it has an on off switch for the hot water as we have little kids and it prevents them from scalding themselves. Not only am I drinking a lot more water and staying hydrated but my kids want to drink water because I get to fill up their own water bottles now. We love this one so much we bought to one for the office and one for the home.
customer_reviews.author: freemojo

customer_reviews.title: Flawed design
customer_reviews.text: We had this for a month and a half and then it started leaking. We don't have water delivered. Instead, we have a clean filter on the sink and just refill a 3 gallon jug for the ease of instant hot/cold water. We never put a full 3 gallons on the dispenser but it would randomly leak a massive amount of water. In process of returning it now. I read one of the reviews say that it jugs designed with a seal that can jar loose with the slightest movement. That is a very flawed and unfortunate design.
customer_reviews.author: Julie

customer_reviews.title: It LEAKS!
customer_reviews.text: Bought this because of a good price. It worked for about a week... Then started leaking from the bottom. Amazon was great and sent a replacement... Which again was fine for a week before it started to leak again from the bottom. Seems more than a coincidence. Bummed because it worked nicely otherwise.. Though it was a little loud. Went to Walmart and got a Primo cooler on sale for $99... And no problems since. I never review products... But I'd seriously consider not buying this!
customer_reviews.author: EB Krause

customer_reviews.title: Not so much.....
customer_reviews.text: This machine is great.... in theory! The first one couldn’t give the water even a chill? So, I drained it and spent days trying to get it dry enough to ship. The second one is the same? Super, hot water and room temp cold. They also never stopped humming? I imagine it was the element try non stop to chill the water? Now I get to go through the empty, dry and ship process AgAiN?! This one will be a straight return. Thankfully, they are very good about exchanging and taking the return. Save the box and packaging... or it’s a real ordeal!
customer_reviews.author: A bird with a French fry

customer_reviews.title: I am very happy with the purchase.
customer_reviews.text: I am VERY happy with this purchase. I have been using the product for a few weeks now. The noise level is a bit more distracting than I thought it would be, but it doesn't last long. I had an issue with the cool water temperature, until I realized I had the back of the machine too close to a wall. I shifted the machine to where the back is well-ventilated and now my water is a very cool temp. The hot water is a good temp. I love the machine and would recommend it to anyone.
customer_reviews.author: Teresa V

customer_reviews.title: I would recommend it as a replacement option for others looking for ...
customer_reviews.text: When moving to a new office our old water cooler did not conveniently fit near an outlet and took up too much space. We ordered this unit to replace it and have been very please with its size and function. It fits well on a countertop without taking up too much space. I would recommend it as a replacement option for others looking for a counter top type water cooler.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Buyer 1976

customer_reviews.title: I’m very happy with this dispenser
customer_reviews.text: I’m very happy with this dispenser. It was extremely easy to set up and the hot water is hot enough to brew tea. If the cold water hasn’t been used for a long time, such as overnight, the first cup dispensed is only cool and then it dispenses cold but I don’t find that a problem. The machine is very quiet with an occasional low hum.
customer_reviews.author: Mari Sol

customer_reviews.title: Cold water isn’t cold
customer_reviews.text: After researching different hot/cold water holder, I came to pick this one. The price is affordable and is actually cheaper than most similar products. However, I was not really satisfied because the water wasn’t that cold. I don’t know if I installed it wrong or what the hell is going on. I decided that I’m going to return this. Maybe it was just me, my previous cold/hot water holder had much colder water.
customer_reviews.author: Benballer

customer_reviews.title: water temperature
customer_reviews.text: this my third unit. Our first was great Honeywell with a temp. control. lost gas after a few years, having three water ports. next another Honeywell came with no temp. control and only TWO ports. HOT and COLD, Lasted for 3 years just lost gas, This unit so far is great, Ice COLD water. no temp, control, but at least its cold, and nice looking, two ports, its good enough, the third port on the first one was for just room temp. water,
customer_reviews.author: Alex Scarselli

customer_reviews.title: Stopped working after three months...
customer_reviews.text: Received September 28th. Easy to set-up, worked well for about a month and a half. Then, refrigerated side became progressively louder, then failed December 20th. Heating side failed December 30th. Getting ready to contact amazon + manufacturer about warranty. See how that goes.
customer_reviews.author: R. Wagner

customer_reviews.title: Great budget water cooler.
customer_reviews.text: This is a great unit. Don't listen to people saying it isn't hot or cold enough. Some people can't be pleased. You can adjust how cold it gets if you open the thing up but I haven't done that because it's perfectly cold enough. I make tea with it too. It's hot enough to make the mug too hot to pick up without the handle. No issues with tea taking too long to seep. It's also great for oatmeal. If it isn't getting cold it probably got turned over in shipping. NEVER tip a refrigerator. Keep it upright as you unbox it. Contact the seller if you have an issue.
customer_reviews.author: Eric Fraze

customer_reviews.title: So So!
customer_reviews.text: This item was working find, til it started leaking and we had to sent it back, but while it was here, hot water was hot but the cold water was someone warm, not very cold....i really do have mix feelings about this item.
customer_reviews.author: Silent Gonzalez

customer_reviews.title: COLD water, YES...
customer_reviews.text: Love, love, love this thing... Able to get cold water with one hand... We have this in a metal fabrication shop with no A/C and needless to say we get pretty dirty... So to be able to get COLD water without having to remove your gloves is huge...
customer_reviews.author: DOB

customer_reviews.title: I love this water despenser
customer_reviews.text: I lost my older model table top water dispenser, in our 6 point earthquake November 30, 2018. It was sad as the despenser was very unique. I looked and looked for a affordable hot and cold water dispenser - I was relieved to find this one. Granted, it isn't the antique model I lost, but it is so attractive on my counter - in my business. Thank you - it works wonderfully.
customer_reviews.author: Sherri

customer_reviews.title: Aqua
customer_reviews.text: After a week or so of solid use, I can day that so far, this thing is great. I bought two of them, one for my classroom and one for my house. No issues with either as of yet. The hot water gets hot and the cold water stays cold. Couldn't be happier. Hopefully they stay working for years to come.
customer_reviews.author: Paul Justin

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: Great water cooler but know there is a smaller than usual amount of hot or cold water available.
customer_reviews.author: Mike P

customer_reviews.title: Impressive
customer_reviews.text: Our many years old cooler died and we ordered this one. It came on Christmas Eve morning and we got it set up right away. Very impressed! I LOVE being able to get HOT water for tea and instant oatmeal right out of the cooler! Our old one had that feature, but even brand new the water was tepid at best. This is amazing and we are constantly telling everyone about it!
customer_reviews.author: Syrenity

customer_reviews.title: The best value!
customer_reviews.text: I have ordered and had to return several other brand dispensers due to either damage, cheaply made or nonfunctional hot/cold temperature. I've had this dispenser 3 months which is longer than any others I've owned. So far I really like this one. Hot and Cold works and it's durable.
customer_reviews.author: Cbakercali

customer_reviews.title: Item just as described.
customer_reviews.text: Item just as described. Compact and cools well. Haven't used the hot water option yet. Well balanced, no worries about it turning over. Instructions could include how to sanitize unit and include bottle tops. Had to purchase separately.
customer_reviews.author: Susan

customer_reviews.title: Cold water to trickles out.  Need to fix thin wall hose.
customer_reviews.text: Exterior design of the water cooler is great, but it has a bad internal tube design that causes the cold water to trickle out. The troubleshooting youtube video shows how to take off the top to realign a pin; however, that’s for an older model. When taking the top off, I found the hose used for connecting the valve to the water supply is a VERY thin walled rubber hose. Based on the angle the hose is installed/designed, and the very flimsy thin wall of the hose, it kinks, which hampers the flow of the water supply.
customer_reviews.author: Bernie Center

customer_reviews.title: Payed for itself
customer_reviews.text: I love how inexpensive it was compared to other water coolers. The water comes out extremely cool and likewise, really hot. No complaints. I'd like to add that I switched from using Sparkletts delivery service which was becoming too expensive. Around 30 bucks a month for 2 bottles plus the delivery service and including the water cooler rental. This has saved me a ton of money.
customer_reviews.author: juliw9

customer_reviews.title: Works well.
customer_reviews.text: This works well for me as I live alone. It will not give you several cups of coffee or iced water in one go but it does not take long to heat up again. Easy to use and easy to clean. Not keen on the color as it shows every water stain and needs to be buffed after wiping down to save the water marks, otherwise it does its job.
customer_reviews.author: Koko

customer_reviews.title: Cold water is extremly cold!!!
customer_reviews.text: We absolutely love this water cooler. You can turn on and off the hot or cold water function. The cold water is extremely cold. Cooler update, We have had this unit now for a year and a half and the water is just as cold as day 1. I am border line fanatical about cold water (First world problem I know...lol) and this is the best purchase I could have made to help with my problem. It has caused my children to drink much more water than they used too. We recommend this 110%. If for some reason it failed today, I would buy it again.
customer_reviews.author: Nick

customer_reviews.title: Works great in our office of 12
customer_reviews.text: We have 12 people using this all day 5 days a week, and the hot water is hot enough for tea. It's been great for us.
customer_reviews.author: T Howard

customer_reviews.title: Great value fir the price
customer_reviews.text: Good size for use on s table top. Great temp for both hot and cold. Using in conjunction with a Zero Water bottle. Only negative comment is the slight difficulty turn on the hot water safety when using one hand to hold a cut under the spigot.
customer_reviews.author: Stephen G. Walls

customer_reviews.title: Excellent, cold
customer_reviews.text: I've owned this model for 4 months now, no issues. Water is cold, as expected. Noise is minimal, unnoticeable. Design is easy and simple to use. This is much better than previous top load dispensers I've used.
customer_reviews.author: Leonidas

customer_reviews.title: Cold water for 3 weeks... 1 star!
customer_reviews.text: 3-weeks of cool water! The unit no longer cools water but the heater works. I’m guessing that’s the next thing to go and I’ll be surprised if it lasts more than a month. Save your money.
customer_reviews.author: Sinister Digger

customer_reviews.title: Refreshing
customer_reviews.text: I have well water in my house so I bought this so I can have some fresh water to drink and I enjoy having cool water whenever I want
customer_reviews.author: shirley

customer_reviews.title: So Convenient
customer_reviews.text: This water cooler is a godsend I decide to buy this water cooler after I had my second baby. I don’t have to open the fridge to get cold water nor do I have to warm water to make baby formula, I have it right on my countertop my husband also love it because the water is hot enough to brew his tea, he doesn’t have to depend on me to boils water to make tea.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Perfect for my office.
customer_reviews.text: Perfect size for an office. Compact and quiet. Provides perfect cold and hot water temperature. Easy and quick set up. Slight plastic taste initially that goes away with time.
customer_reviews.author: Cursetina

customer_reviews.title: Works great
customer_reviews.text: High quality product. Had it for a year and no issues at all. I love it. I use it in my home music studio. My only small gripe is it is a bit noisy so sometimes I have to turn it off as the hum is distracting. I really don't think it would be a bother to anyone except in this particular situation so I still give it 5 stars.
customer_reviews.author: HitoV

customer_reviews.title: Great home or office water cooler.
customer_reviews.text: Perfect for home or office use. Hot water is perfect for tea and the cold water great too. If I want ice water, Duh I add ice. It's only been a week and 5 gallons of water so far but I will update as time goes on. I am very happy with my purchase!
customer_reviews.author: Dug E Phresh

customer_reviews.title: Perfect.
customer_reviews.text: Perfect - a bit big when I actually got it. But I should’ve looked at dimensions- exactly how it was advertised. And simply a great product.
customer_reviews.author: Moree Hai Ivgi

customer_reviews.title: Maybe defective?
customer_reviews.text: Well, it works ok except the cold water side doesn’t come out normal. It’s more of a trickle which is super annoying when trying to fill a cup it takes forever. The machine cools just fine and heats water great too but the cold dispenser is just so slow. Maybe it was defective I don’t know but besides that it’s ok.
customer_reviews.author: Becky G

customer_reviews.title: It looks and works great
customer_reviews.text: I love it. Found a home for it on top of my small refrigerator. I have my hot and cold water on top and a good chill center to hold my other stuff underneath. Very happy.
customer_reviews.author: James Leon Windham

customer_reviews.title: Awesome water cooler/heater
customer_reviews.text: Love that this one has an option on the side to turn the heat on or not makes it extra safe for my little one to use. I have a 3 gallon jug on it but can also hold a 5 gallon. Better than my taller unit.
customer_reviews.author: Shakari

customer_reviews.title: Disappointing
customer_reviews.text: The cold water side started making a loud vibration noise and the smell of burning plastic, time to request a refund 😒 Never even used the hot side! Lame! Now that I read other reviews seems this machine is just not of quality.
customer_reviews.author: Jamie

customer_reviews.title: Works Well
customer_reviews.text: Rattles just a bit sometimes when the compressor comes on. But works well. Still gets a 5 in my book. I purchased a couple of milk crates from Home Depot and it sits well. See image.
customer_reviews.author: Suge

customer_reviews.title: Perfect but cheaper on manufacturer site
customer_reviews.text: Pros: Solid product-works perfectly and is quiet. Cons: Avalon sells it $20 cheaper with free shipping. It’s also heavy (awkward) if you have to carry it a long distance or up stairs when you receive it. I called about delivery before placing order but they could not guarantee it would come straight to my door (3rd floor)
customer_reviews.author: Kelly

customer_reviews.title: Great cooler
customer_reviews.text: This cooler is perfect. Ice cold water, and hot water. Taste is great. I bought a different one before this one and it tasted nasty. It got sent back. This one is great
customer_reviews.author: Cindy Sailer

customer_reviews.title: great cooler
customer_reviews.text: run white vinegar through first to get the chemical taste out then its great cooler.
customer_reviews.author: Cindy Lou Who

customer_reviews.title: Great product!
customer_reviews.text: I had reservations about getting this as a returned item. I got it half price and it works great! The flow from the taps are better than most I have used. The hot water is great for teas and soups in my mug.
customer_reviews.author: Holly T

customer_reviews.title: Loud
customer_reviews.text: It's fairly Loud. Glad I didn't get it for use in a bedroom
customer_reviews.author: kevinmorgan

customer_reviews.title: Well made and works great!
customer_reviews.text: I bought this cooler on a lighting deal and it's been a great investment! My children drink so much water that water bottles form the store didn't work anymore. Do yourself a favor, get one of these bad boys!
customer_reviews.author: Nick A Horrigan

customer_reviews.title: Amazing and dispenses water quickly
customer_reviews.text: This product replaced a cooler that was working but dispensed water so slowly. This product was easy to set up, works well and dispenses water with lightening speed. Well faster than the one it replaced!
customer_reviews.author: wendi

customer_reviews.title: Great value
customer_reviews.text: My husband uses this in his office and it is great. Compact, easy to use.
customer_reviews.author: Lisa Saunders

customer_reviews.title: Too loud. Started leaking after 6 months
customer_reviews.text: The cooler and heater has always been very loud. And, it runs a lot. The hot water often has small white floaters. Last night (6 months of use), it started leaking, so I had to empty it and stop using it. Even if it didn't leak after 6 months, I wouldn't buy it again.
customer_reviews.author: Stephen M Keinath

customer_reviews.title: Needs a led light.
customer_reviews.text: Needs a led light aimed at he glass to see the water level. Many better coolers have such lights.
customer_reviews.author: Greg Killian

customer_reviews.title: It's small and I set it atop an old school ...
customer_reviews.text: It's small and I set it atop an old school water carrier crate to make it easier to load the bottles. It does the job and I was tired of paying to rent a cooler. Its' been working well with cold water, I haven't used the hot water side yet.
customer_reviews.author: Scoobyc5

customer_reviews.title: Worth the $
customer_reviews.text: Water is cold and product is exactly as explained. We love it. It is a little clunky appearance wise so it would be nice if they made it look a little more modern but still a great product!
customer_reviews.author: MC

customer_reviews.title: Works perfect....
customer_reviews.text: Just what I needed for my garage. Super easy set up, very cold and very hot water. You should buy this item.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Hot and cold stopped working after 2 months
customer_reviews.text: I liked that it is small and able to sit on a counter. I have been using it for 2 months and now the heat and refrigeration part is not working. The water comes out of both at room temperature. Disappointed that this produced only worked for 2 months. I have had other water coolers last many years.
customer_reviews.author: Nicole Hill

customer_reviews.title: Great
customer_reviews.text: Works great. I love it and have gotten compliments from it being in my office. It fits perfectly on top of my mini-fridge.
customer_reviews.author: Garrett

customer_reviews.title: Unexpected leakage
customer_reviews.text: Item started to leak unexpectedly. I woke up to a flooded kitchen. I actually liked the cooler a whole lot. It could very well be a single defected cooler. I purchased another, and its fine so far
customer_reviews.author: Savitri Mohabir

customer_reviews.title: Not cold
customer_reviews.text: The warm water is super hot, but the cold water is just room temperature. I bought this so that I wouldn’t have to buy bottled water and refrigerate it, yet, I’m still doing this just to have cold water.
customer_reviews.author: Brett Butler

customer_reviews.title: Best in Class
customer_reviews.text: I don't know what we did before we bought this machine. It is of high quality and dispenses ice cold and piping hot water. My family and I drink a lot of water, and this has saved us from having to buy bottled water every week. Could not be more pleased.
customer_reviews.author: Jeremy S.

customer_reviews.title: A good quality water dispenser. Best tabletop available.
customer_reviews.text: Ice cold Water, hot water good for your noodles, coffee or hot cocoa!
customer_reviews.author: R. D.

customer_reviews.title: Excellent product for the price
customer_reviews.text: Excellent Water cooler easy to set up hot water is really hard cold is really cold
customer_reviews.author: Lou0611

customer_reviews.title: Well worth it 👌
customer_reviews.text: Great product..hot I'd hot! Cold is very cold Perfect for our shop I would recommend.
customer_reviews.author: Jeanne Stull

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: I love that it is compact but the water could dispense a little faster
customer_reviews.author: TrishiaJj

customer_reviews.title: Trash
customer_reviews.text: Had to give 1 start to be able to post that this is COMPLETELY TRASH AVOID AT ALL COST!!! Or else it will be more expensive!
customer_reviews.author: You

customer_reviews.title: It has been functioning just great.
customer_reviews.text: I have been using the unit for a month. It has been functioning just great.
customer_reviews.author: Koorosh Hariri

customer_reviews.title: Great product!
customer_reviews.text: I’m using this in my classroom, and it’s getting a ton of use! Great product! Hot and cold both work extremely well, and water flow is awesome!
customer_reviews.author: Wadatrip

customer_reviews.title: Junk
customer_reviews.text: It leaked about 3 gallons overnight the first night I thought that I made a mistake so the second night I put it in the shower put another bottle of water on it and it leaked about the same amount the next night.
customer_reviews.author: Dalton Karr

customer_reviews.title: Works for us
customer_reviews.text: Cold water is cold and hot water is hot. The size is perfect for us, we have it on top of our compact refrigerator. Compressor is very quiet.
customer_reviews.author: Mike

customer_reviews.title: BEST
customer_reviews.text: Perfect for home and office. Bought two! Saves money and use of unnecessary plastic bottles.
customer_reviews.author: christine

customer_reviews.title: Works Good
customer_reviews.text: A lot of cautions and steps to set up the machine but it works well.
customer_reviews.author: Ryan

customer_reviews.title: so far so good
customer_reviews.text: no weird taste, hot water is HOT cold is COLD....only had for 2 weeks so far so good
customer_reviews.author: N B.

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: Awesome water dispenser. Water comes out fairly quickly with either the hot or cold setting.
customer_reviews.author: David G.

customer_reviews.title: perfect for even the bedroom.
customer_reviews.text: does what it says and can even use 3 gallon bottles with it.
customer_reviews.author: Richard B.

customer_reviews.title: Easy to use
customer_reviews.text: I use this mainly for drinking room temperature water and staying well hydrated more than normal. Today I used the heat setting to make tea. The temperature was enough to make tea and I did not burn my mouth. Overall this is nice to have in order to stay well hydrated and healthy.
customer_reviews.author: Matt

customer_reviews.title: Not as cold as average dispensers
customer_reviews.text: Easy to set up but does cool water enough like most dispensers
customer_reviews.author: Ibitoye

customer_reviews.title: Haven’t used yet
customer_reviews.text: We are going to use this in our bar and casino
customer_reviews.author: angela davis

customer_reviews.title: its great. Cold water is cold
customer_reviews.text: Have had at work for a few months now. its great. Cold water is cold. Hot is hot. I can get cheap water at home depot. No leaks. Even thinking about getting one for my house.
customer_reviews.author: Brandon Canfield

customer_reviews.title: Defrosting issue
customer_reviews.text: When the cold is left on, item defrosts and puddles water everywhere, have to turn cold on and let run before use and turn off after.
customer_reviews.author: blue and furee

customer_reviews.title: Very satisfied!
customer_reviews.text: I bought this to use at work in my office with a couple of other people. I love, love, love it. It doesn't take up a ton of room, and it gives me both cold and hot water. It's very easy to use. I liked it so much I bought one to use at home, since we pretty much exclusively drink water. So far, no problems with it at all. Highly recommend.
customer_reviews.author: Susan C

customer_reviews.title: LOUD! Unbearably loud. Returning.
customer_reviews.text: EXCRUCIATINGLY loud! Great look, easy to install but the condenser in the back buzzes like a 20 year old refrigerator. Returning product and going back to Nutrichef.
customer_reviews.author: Kyle Brown

customer_reviews.title: Works great!!
customer_reviews.text: Has hot or cold water ready when you want it. no issues
customer_reviews.author: Triciamarie

customer_reviews.title: Easy to set up and use - perfect size
customer_reviews.text: Put this in my office and switched to water from soda. Feel healthier, and is really a convenient item to have.
customer_reviews.author: Spring Valley NY

customer_reviews.title: Hot water dispenser safety feature and temperature
customer_reviews.text: The hot water dispenser is on point have never had an issue, comes out hot enough to make cocoa or tea! The safety button makes it so the little once don’t burn themselves Incase the are able to get to it.
customer_reviews.author: Tracy Loveberry-Ross

customer_reviews.title: This is the replacement of the product, the previous ...
customer_reviews.text: This is the replacement of the product, the previous one was maul functioned, I requested to replace it, having had waited for a week, I finally received it, this time the cold water running so slow.......guess what should I do... ask for replacement again? Or call repairing services?
customer_reviews.author: Sharon Wong

customer_reviews.title: JUNK - ROOM TEMPERATURE ONLY
customer_reviews.text: I would not even give it one star. I got one and it didn't heat, room temp water only. I wanted to return, but didn't have the box. Got a second, one to return the first one. The second one doesn't work. Could get anyone to help me get it send out (can't lift) and so my card was charged AGAIN! I have paid for two and neither of them worked! I am on a limited budget and basically gave money away. So upset! It is cheaply made also, cheap plastic, shouldn't have thought the second one would work.
customer_reviews.author: S. Oak

customer_reviews.title: Disappointed
customer_reviews.text: i ordered this and once i got it it the cold button didnt work only the hot option. Luckily amazon replaced it. I receieved a new one right away and both cold/hot options worked. 4 months later now both stopped working. Im very disappointed on this purchase.
customer_reviews.author: rosy

customer_reviews.title: Loud noises
customer_reviews.text: Only issue I have is loud noise throughout and sometimes really bad
customer_reviews.author: Amol

customer_reviews.title: Good temperature, hot and cold.
customer_reviews.text: I initially complained about the taste, but support sent me a cleaning kit the next day. Great service and support.
customer_reviews.author: Roger

customer_reviews.title: You can’t go wrong buying this
customer_reviews.text: Love everything about this. Hot water is HOT, cold water is COLD! We use it at work, where we have limited space. This fits perfectly. Highly recommend this product
customer_reviews.author: Karen Kraft

customer_reviews.title: Hot water dispenses very slowly
customer_reviews.text: The water cooler was easy to set up. The cold water is chilled and works great. The hot water is hot but comes out as a very slow trickle and the safety button is very hard to press down. Would be five stars if the hot water dispensed better.
customer_reviews.author: L.A.C.

customer_reviews.title: Awesome full-sized countertop option
customer_reviews.text: Great product, I love the full-sized countertop option. Working out perfectly!
customer_reviews.author: Rebecca L.

customer_reviews.title: Good value, but bit of noise.
customer_reviews.text: Good value, but I never turn it on. The cooler is a bit noisy.
customer_reviews.author: Shane Reed

customer_reviews.title: Works great keeps water cold had it for 6 months now ...
customer_reviews.text: Works great keeps water cold had it for 6 months now and really like it. Don't use heater part as we don't need the hot water
customer_reviews.author: Dutchman

customer_reviews.title: Great space saver!
customer_reviews.text: With limited counter space, this fit the bill. Instant hot water is a plus, wife is enjoying for tea. The condenser does “hum”, which you can clearly hear but not uncommon for this type of appliance.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Good buy
customer_reviews.text: The hot water is hot. The cold water is cold. Fits nicely on the counter and looks good too.
customer_reviews.author: Melanie Vidra

customer_reviews.title: Satisfied & so far I have no complaints.
customer_reviews.text: It's been great so far. Had it for about a month now.
customer_reviews.author: Marian C.

customer_reviews.title: Stopped working
customer_reviews.text: I bought this in February and has just stopped working.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Great water cooler!
customer_reviews.text: Can be put on a counter. It takes very little space and is easy to use.
customer_reviews.author: Kathy suglia

customer_reviews.title: This thing is super loud
customer_reviews.text: If I could give a zero-star review I would this thing is way too loud do not buy it
customer_reviews.author: Ronald Eary

product_meta.title: Avalon Premium Hot/Cold Top Loading Countertop Water Cooler Dispenser With Child Safety Lock. UL/Energy Star Approved- Black - A1CTWTRCLRBLK
product_meta.description: Style:countertop black| Pattern Name:DispenserThe Avalon Countertop Hot/Cold Water Cooler is made with innovation and style. The easy-to-use paddle spouts make it so much more convenient to use. Simply press your cup against the paddle to let the flow of water to come out. The machines highly efficient compressor makes the cold water crisp and ice cold at approximately 47° F without the need of adding ice cubes to your drink. The hot faucet is hot enough to cook one's tea or coffee or any other steaming hot beverage at approximately 180° F. Due to the extremely hot water, we’ve added a child safety lock on the hot water faucet. This water cooler is suitable for both 3 and 5 gallon bottles. The water dispensing area measures 9.5x2.5x10 inches with a height of 7 inches below the spouts to accommodate most large cups and bottles. At the bottom of the dispensing are there is a large removable drip tray to catch and spills. The water cooler is UL listed and complies with all standards of Energy Star. The unit dimensions are 12x12x19 inches.
feature_bullets: HOT & COLD WATER SPOUTS: When you use our water cooler dispenser you can choose between a Crisp Cold & Piping Hot Output, making it ideal for cool refreshments or toasty beverages.
CHILD SAFE: Our water cooler dispenser is UL/Energy Star Approved and features a child safety lock on the hot water spout so the entire family can use it worry free!
INNOVATIVE & STYLISH DESIGN: Avalon’s Countertop Top Loading Water Cooler Dispenser features a slim design that won’t look bulky, even in small spaces, and fits on any tabletop.
TIME SAVING: Our top loading water cooler dispenser saves time when you need to make a quick cup of tea, hot cocoa, or instant soup! You never have to wait for a pot or kettle to boil.
TOP LOADING DISPENSER: This water cooler dispenser loads from the top & allows you to spot if the dispenser is running out of water, which is a great feature for office settings.
Note: Kindly refere user manaul provided for installation and troubleshooting
